incompatibilities.title: Iris shaders hidden by Sodium Extras
incompatibilities.symptom: The Iris shader selection screen fails to appear in Video Settings.
incompatibilities.reason: Sodium Extras replaces the video settings screen and hides Iris' shader button.
incompatibilities.workaround: Disable Sodium Extras' video menu override or remove the mod to restore the shader button.

incompatibilities.title: Oculus shaders blocked by menu overhauls
incompatibilities.symptom: The shader selection option from Oculus is missing from graphics settings.
incompatibilities.reason: Video settings overhauls replace the menu that Oculus augments, hiding shader controls.
incompatibilities.workaround: Disable the conflicting menu overhaul or use its compatibility setting for Oculus.
